section.title: Common setup for all machines
section.para: The information in the following sections is the same for all machines and needs to be done at the appropriate time of the setup.

section.title: Repository setup
section.para: Distributions releases and OpenStack releases are independend of each other and thus you need to add some extra steps to access the latest OpenStack release after installation of the machine before installation of any OpenStack packages.

procedure.title: To use the Ubuntu Cloud Archive for Grizzly

step.para: Install the keyring: # apt-get install ubuntu-cloud-keyring
Upgrade the system (and reboot if you need): # apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade

section.para: Use the Fedora repositories for Grizzly: # wget http://repos.fedorapeople.org/repos/openstack/openstack-grizzly/fedora-openstack-grizzly.repo # mv fedora-openstack-grizzly.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/
Use the Open Build Service repositories for Grizzly: # zypper ar -f obs://Cloud:OpenStack:Grizzly/openSUSE_12.3 Grizzly
